channel.title: OCaml on Andy White
channel.description: Recent content in OCaml on Andy White

item.title: A Layman's Guide to Functors in ReasonML
item.description: In my intro post I talked about my background and how I started on my journey to learn typed functional programming. I’ll again preface these posts with a note that I don’t have a background in category theory, so these posts are intended to help introduce things from a boots-on-the-ground perspective. Please feel free to correct me on any points I’ve messed up. I’m also not an OCaml expert, so there may be techniques or coding conventions here that are not completely correct.
